messages.subject: weather
messages.msgSnippet: Well it is suppossed to be around 0 degrees by the middle of the week, won t that be fun? I envy those of you where it s warm....especially Florida.  My senior
messages.messageBody:
Well it is suppossed to be around 0 degrees by the middle of the week, won't
that be fun?
I envy those of you where it's warm....especially Florida. My senior year of
college I had an internship at the botanical gardens in Sarasota, FL- it was
beautiful!!!!
My husband is from upstate NY and that's where we are and will stay it looks
like...unless we move to Vt which he is interested in as well. My dad was in
the Air Force and we lived all over. I do miss swimming in the pool on xmas
day!
But oh, the warm weather would be nice!!!! Hope you are enjoying it because
I would really love to take the kids for a nice walk to the park in shorts.
Well, we could but it might be a bit chilly! LOL
Amanda in Albany


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
